rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a foyer and closet area. Positioned near the entrance for quick access.
The main living space adjacent to the courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
An adjoining dining area next to the living room with Vastu considerations ensuring positive energy flow.
A functional kitchen with modern amenities and easy access to the dining area.
A dedicated home office space designed for quiet work and optimal lighting, aligned with Vastu for prosperity.
An additional bedroom for guests or family use, placed near the main living area.
The master suite featuring ample space and privacy, oriented according to Vastu for health and well-being.
A central courtyard that connects all spaces with natural light and ventilation in accordance with traditional Indian design and Vastu.

openings.description: Main entrance providing access from the street into the foyer area.
Large windows in the living room and home office to allow ample natural light while maintaining privacy.
Access door leading to the central courtyard from the master bedroom.
